评论详情: I liked the pants so much that I bought the shorts. The shorts are made of heavy-knit fabric and are soft and easy to work in. They look great for cypherpunk but can also be worn to the store. They look just like the picture.
I wear these all the time now. Super comfy. And the zipper pockets are fire. I've gotten a bunch of compliments on them
Quality was not as it looks in the picture. These are more like sweat material and not very structured. Comfy but not as stylish.

Usually stuff like this is cheap material or poorly made but honestly these are great, wish the pockets had velcro or something to keep them closed if you put something in them but otherwise highly recommend them for casual wear for my tech wear fans during the summer heat
Every pocket ripped at the seam after one 4 hour shift as a dishwasher.

评论概述: Fat ol phone in pockets, no problemo!
评论详情: I've worn these pants for a whole day now and the one glaring thing I really love about them, is how my cell phone rests in the front pocket.  It just sits there and doesn't move much at all while walking or doing anything else.  I have an s21 ultra, and a z fold 6 and with one in each pocket I barely noticed they were there.  I was really surprised that pants with such a relaxed fit would carry a phone so well.  The fact that most pants suck for holding phones comfortably I was really shocked at how good it felt to have them on me.  Def recommend these pants.

评论概述: Looks great, with only one problem
评论详情: Comfortable and fantastic looking, but they run a little small size up your order for better fit.
These are a very thin material. My son didn't like them and wouldn't wear them. Also, the buckles are really heavy and weigh the shorts down.

评论概述: XYXIONGMAO men joggers tech wear black hip
评论详情: The material is super soft a stretchy,the waisted band is stretchy. My son wears a 34 waist in jeans ...he is 17 years old usuly he wears 1x in regular sweets ...this shorts run small so I got him a 3x and it fit perfect not to tight not to lose .if you don't want to baggy then go for a 2x

My husband loves these shorts. I got him a large and he is 155 lbs and 5 ft 7inches and they look awesome on him. I am so jealous of them lol. He says they are the most comfortable shorts he has ever owned and he loves how big the pockets are
Looks great and fits nice.
These shorts are not what I expected. They are very stretchy like spandex. They fit very strange. They’re not near carpenter pants at all not at all what I expected will be returning them.

They are not deep purple like the photo suggests, they are more like pastel purple. The material is not typical what cargo shorts are made from, these are more like heavy sweatpants material which makes them hot as hell to wear in the summer!

So I ordered a large size thinking it would fit like a men's medium and I was right as soon as I put it on. So these sizes are obviously asian sizes and I'm gonna make a list of how it is versus US sizes. I hope this helps for future customers.  Small = US X Small Medium = US Small Large = US Medium X Large = US Large XX Large = US X Large XXX Large = US XX Large

They're stretchy. They feel Amazing on me. I LOVE TECHWEAR. I've bought from this company a few times! The shorts aren't too tight or too loose. They're perfect for walking around in my opinion .. I have yet to try them at an anime con - but hopefully they feel a good as the techwear pants from this same company!
I absolutely love them. They fit perfectly and just as advertised. I plan to get more of this brand.
they are great honestly the material is sturdy and worth the price the only thing that didn't give it full stars is that they run small a 3x is more like a xl  or L so just keep that in mind

评论概述: They run two sizes too small and the sizing chart is wrong.
评论详情: They run two sizes too small and the sizing chart is wrong.

I wear these often as lounge shorts, they’re comfortable and don’t hug too much if you buy the right size. Personally I believe the price was worth it and it doesn’t feel like it’s cheap and will tear easily. The pockets are standard for men so if any women are looking into having pockets, get em.

They are very low quality shorts and one of the zippers broke in the first few times using them. They also came with chalk writing on them that is stained into the fabric. That being said they fit fine and are comfortable.
My son loves these He didn't think he would He tried them material good now their his favorite We will be buying more

I never have high hopes when ordering clothing on amazon, especially anything that was imported from china, but man was i surprised! Im a M to L, but wanted it to fit big, so ordered an XL. The waist band is all elastic, so taking on and off is a breeze, the legs are long [im almost 6foot and it reaches my knees] and while the material is a kinda slick and plasticy feeling [its not denim or cotton] it is still thick enough that it dosnt feel like they are gonna rip or fall apart. Im not going to put them in the dryer, just to be safe, but i feel alright machine washing them!  These are for a casual/ street style cosplay, so I wont be wearing them on the daily, but they feel super comfy and cant wait to pair it with a techwear hoodie i have coming in the mail!  All in all, will be buying from them again. LOVED this purchase!

The fabric is breathable and loose, but nicely made. The pockets are deep. The straps on the legs are removable and adjustable in length, which I like since I use them to workout in and just as summer shorts. Drawstrings on the waistband make them always a perfect fit. Not too long either, as they land just at the knee. They're fashionable without being too attention grabbing. Great shorts.

Unfortunately the quality of these shorts is not as high as I'd expect. Although the material feels and looks good there are a lot of loose threads, especially around the elastic waist band which makes me doubtful about how long these will actually hold up. For £24 I expect a little bit better quality, especially concerning such basics.  I do have to say the design is very good and they are very comfortable. I ordered an XL (I have 34inch waist) and they fit a little tight.
